Defense Donald Rumsfeld . The senator from Arizona gave a terse response Thursday to claims made in Donald Rumsfeld 's new book`` Known and Unknown.'' Donald Rumsfeld had claimed John McCain had a`` hair-trigger temper'' and a propensity to shift his positions to appeal to the media. `` I respect Donald Rumsfeld ,'' John McCain began by telling ABC's George Stephanopoulos .`` He and I had a very, very strong difference of opinion about the strategy that he was employing in Iraq,

Bill Lockyer , California's state treasurer, participated in a national telephonic news conference with EPI officials, to denounce the bankruptcy concept. No state needs to declare bankruptcy, Bill Lockyer said,`` The states have sovereign taxing power the big companies don't.'' Bill Lockyer 's point- a valid one- is that bankruptcy is the refuge for individuals, corporations and local governments
